Interfaces

Interface StableInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface StableInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Stable interface to implement the stub for other entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void entertainTheGuests()
      Broker calls the horses to entertain the guests.
      void horseOutOfStable()
      Horse came out of stable.
      void proceedToStable(int id, int raceNumber, HorseJockeyState state)
      Horses go to the stable and wait for the calling of the broker.
      void serviceEnd()
      Stop the service and shuts down the shared region.
      void setRaceNumber(int raceNumber)
      Set the number of the next race.
      void summonHorsesToPaddock()
      Call all horses to come out of the stable to the paddock.

            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Set the number of the next race.
        Parameters:

                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException

      • proceedToStable

        void proceedToStable(int id,
                     int raceNumber,
                     HorseJockeyState state)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Horses go to the stable and wait for the calling of the broker. Waits for the broker to call the horses to the race number of the horse, or to entertain the guests.
        Parameters:
        id - horse id
        raceNumber - current race number
        state - horse state
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
